name: Seek the Light (tinymoons)
description:
v1.0 .0 Demo - The First Two Levels 

Balance your power and water gauges and uncover the mystery of what happened to your space station while escorting your tiny plant friend to safety.

Full screen to be able to read the text. Hit the back button on your browser to return to the Itch page. The HTML5 build might be a bit slow on some systems.

Seek the Light is the post-jam version of my Ludum Dare 50 game and is actively in development. I hope you enjoy these two sample levels!
